loss module¶

class loss.BCE_KL_loss¶

Bases: torch.nn.modules.module.Module

Reconstruction loss for variational auto-encoders.

Binary-cross entropy reconstruction + KL divergence losses summed over all elements and batch. Mostly taken from pytorch examples: https://github.com/pytorch/examples/blob/master/vae/main.py

forward(outputs, target)¶

Forward function of the module.

forward(outputs, target)

Forward function of the module.

Parameters

  • outputs – List of the form [reconstruction, mean, logvariance].

  • target – ground truth.

Returns

The BCE + KLD loss.

Return type

torch.tensor

class loss.MSE_KL_loss¶

Bases: torch.nn.modules.module.Module

Reconstruction loss for variational auto-encoders.

Mean squared error reconstruction + KL divergence losses summed over all elements and batch. Mostly taken from pytorch examples: https://github.com/pytorch/examples/blob/master/vae/main.py

forward(outputs, target)¶

Forward function of the module.

forward(outputs, target)

Forward function of the module.

Parameters

  • outputs – List of the form [reconstruction, mean, logvariance].

  • target – ground truth.

Returns

The MSE + KLD loss.

Return type

torch.tensor

class loss.Multihead_loss(loss_function, weights=[1])¶

Bases: torch.nn.modules.module.Module

Compute the loss on multiple outputs.

Parameters

  • loss_function (list) – List of loss functions with either len(loss_function) = len(targets) or len(loss_function) = 1.

  • weights (list) – List of weights for each loss. Default = [1].

loss_function¶

List of loss functions with either len(loss_function) = len(targets) or len(loss_function) = 1.

Type

list

weights¶

List of weights for each loss. Default = [1].

Type

list

forward(outputs, target)¶

Forward function of the module.

forward(outputs, target)

Forward function of the module.

Parameters

  • outputs (list) – List of network outputs.

  • target (list) – List of targets where len(outputs) = len(target).

Returns

total_loss – The total loss.

Return type

torch.tensor

Raises

AssertionError – Length of outputs not equal to length of target length of attribute loss_function not equal to target

nitorch
